name: @chasenocap/meta-gothic-framework
description: Meta GOTHIC Framework - AI-Guided Opinionated TypeScript Framework with High Intelligent Components

scripts.dev:repo-agent: cd services/repo-agent-service && WORKSPACE_ROOT=$PWD npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ui && npm run build:packages
scripts.build:packages: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run build); done
scripts.test:all: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm test); done
scripts.lint:all: for dir in packages/*/; do (cd "$dir" && npm run lint); done

author: ChaseNoCap
